response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Considering its worth to you, I am offering this exclusive opportunity at a special price of $1,100,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1100000}
